branding.tagline: Connecting Ivy League Talent with Industry Leaders

hero.title: Connect Ivy League Talent with Industry Leaders
hero.subtitle: Street2Ivy bridges the gap between elite university students and Fortune 500 companies through meaningful project-based collaborations.

items.title: Elite Talent Pool
items.description: Access pre-vetted students from top universities including Harvard, Yale, Princeton, and more.

items.title: Real Projects
items.description: Engage students with meaningful work that makes a real impact on your business.

items.title: Seamless Collaboration
items.description: Our platform handles contracts, payments, and communication so you can focus on results.

items.title: Post Your Project
items.description: Describe your project needs and requirements. Our team will help match you with the right talent.

items.title: Review Applications
items.description: Browse qualified candidates, review portfolios, and select the perfect match for your project.

items.title: Collaborate & Succeed
items.description: Work together through our secure platform with built-in tools for communication and delivery.

items.quote: Street2Ivy connected me with an amazing internship opportunity at a Fortune 500 company. The experience was invaluable!
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: The quality of talent we found through Street2Ivy exceeded our expectations. These students brought fresh perspectives to our projects.
items.author: Michael Roberts

items.quote: As a first-generation college student, Street2Ivy gave me access to opportunities I never knew existed.
items.author: James Williams

items.quote: We've hired three full-time employees from Street2Ivy projects. It's become our primary talent pipeline.
items.author: Emily Thompson

items.quote: The platform made it easy to showcase my skills and connect with companies that value diversity and fresh thinking.
items.author: David Park

items.quote: Street2Ivy's vetting process ensures we only work with the most motivated and talented students.
items.author: Lisa Anderson

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of students and companies already using Street2Ivy to create meaningful connections.
